00017 void CopyLists (const NiTPointerList<T> &from, NiTPointerList<T> &to)
00018 {
00019         to.RemoveAll();
00020         NiTListIterator it = from.GetHeadPos();
00021         for (unsigned int i=0; i<from.GetSize(); i++)
00022         {
00023                 to.AddTail(from.Get(it));
00024                 it = from.GetNextPos(it);
00025         }
00026 }
